key_points: Gabrielle Petito, a 22-year-old woman from Long Island, NY, is missing.
She was last in contact with her family during the last week of August.
Petito was traveling through Wyoming with her fiancé, documenting their journey on Instagram and YouTube.
Her family reported her missing on September 11.
The van she and her fiancé traveled in has been recovered, but details about its condition are not provided.
Petito's fiancé returned to his home in Florida alone.
Her last Instagram post was on August 25, the same day she last spoke to her mother.
Petito and her fiancé started a YouTube channel to document their 'van life' journey.
Her family and friends are pleading for information to help find her.
The police and her family are asking anyone with information to contact Crime Stoppers.
